subject: Alpine Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Bode Miller, considered one of the greatest American male Alpine skiers, has his sights set on a bold return this winter, just in time to bid for his fifth Winter Olympics.
snippet: Bode Miller, considered one of the greatest American male Alpine skiers, has his sights set on a bold return this winter, just in time to bid for his fifth Winter Olympics.
